headline: Lilly and EVA Pharma announce regulatory approval and release of locally manufactured insulin in Egypt
summary: The Egyptian Drug Authority approved the insulin glargine injection manufactured by EVA Pharma through a collaboration with Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE: LLY). Launched in 2022, the collaboration aims to deliver a sustainable supply of high-quality, affordable human and analog insulin to at least one million people annually living with type 1 and type 2 diabetes in low- to middle-income countries (LMICs), most of which are in Africa.

headline: Sanofi sues HHS to defend 340B rebate policy
